duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the 'Machine Data and Infrastructure' software team in the delivery of software applications within Crop Care Software.
Coordinate among a set of teams to jointly develop plans to achieve PSI and program objectives.
Develop the talent of the team to meet the future needs of our technology portfolio.
Manage the estimation, capacity, commitments, and output of your agile team(s).

education_certification.credential: Bachelors of Science Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical/Mechanical Engineering, Agricultural Engineering, or equivalent experience.
